formal_name:
Puzzle to Go
Planets and Universe
description:
Puzzle to Go Planets and Universe is the jigsaw puzzle for on the move. Puzzle together the most beautiful motifs wherever and whenever you like. Collect stars for each completed jigsaw puzzle and release new images. Each motif is available in three different degrees of difficulty.

Would you rather decide for yourself on the images you wish to puzzle together? No problem! Puzzle to Go also allows you to puzzle together all the images from the photoalbum of your Nintendo DSi.

Features:

- 10 unique space motifs

- 3 different degrees of difficulty: 68, 88 or 130 pieces

- Play to obtain stars and release new motifs

- Puzzle together all images stored in your album

Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.
name:
Puzzle to Go
Planets and Universe
